alert.note: Alert for McCook; Minnehaha; Turner (South Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Sioux Falls (Southeastern SD, Southwestern MN, and Northwestern IA)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued May 04 at 10:56AM MDT until May 04 at 11:30AM MDT by NWS Sioux Falls
info.description: The National Weather Service in Sioux Falls has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southwestern Minnehaha County in southeastern South Dakota... East central McCook County in southeastern South Dakota... Northeastern Turner County in southeastern South Dakota... * Until 1230 PM CDT. * At 1156 AM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Humboldt, or near Lake Vermillion State Recreation Area, moving southeast at 15 mph. HAZARD...Half dollar size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Damage to vehicles is expected. * This severe thunderstorm will be near... Humboldt around 1205 PM CDT. Other locations in the path of this severe thunderstorm include Hartford, Crooks and Wall Lake. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.25 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...<50 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
